---
title: "Palmer Penguins Dashboard"
author: "Sophia Brown"
format: dashboard
---

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

penguins <- read_csv("data/penguins_lter.csv")

penguins <- penguins %>%
  clean_names()

```

make a dashboard w 2 rows. row 1 contains 2 graphs showing any penguin data you'd like. row 2 contains a table (use knitr::kable and select if you'd like to narrow down the columns). then customize the dashboard by adding colors, labels, interactivity

## Row 1

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(y= culmen_length_mm, x= island)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, color = species)) +
  geom_point()
```

## Row 2

```{r}
penguins <- penguins %>%
  select(-comments)

knitr::kable(penguins)
```
